protein.specific_function: Essential transmembrane GTPase, which mediates mitochondrial fusion. Fusion of mitochondria occurs in many cell types and constitutes an important step in mitochondria morphology, which is balanced between fusion and fission. MFN1 acts independently of the cytoskeleton. Overexpression induces the formation of mitochondrial networks.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides
hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides, in phosphorus-containing anhydrides

reference.reference_text: Santel A, Fuller MT: Control of mitochondrial morphology by a human mitofusin. J Cell Sci. 2001 Mar;114(Pt 5):867-74.
